ProductInfo.Features:
Indoor delicate mini lipstick bullet camera.
600 TVL high resolution, 1/3" Sony Super HAD CCD II image sensor.
3.6mm fixed lens, Min. Illumination 0.1Lux @ F1.2, Input Voltage 12V.
IP 65 protection rate housing. Dimension: 70.4mm x 23.0mm
Applicable in Fiance, Supermarkets, telecommunications, hotels, offices, corridors, stairs, garage and other indoor monitoring sites.
ProductInfo.Name: Indoor Color Bullet Security Camera 600 TVL Built-in 1/3" Sony Super HAD CCD II 3.6 mm Fix Wide Angle View Lens for CCTV DVR Home Office Surveillance Secure System Weatherproof DC 12V Black
